nodes.bodyText: I think this should be a red record circle.
Actually after playing with this it makes it feel like we're recording while paused as there is a big red recording icon. Lets not change this at the moment.

I don’t think play is at all clear, though. Does it indicate ongoing playback? Playing back what you just recorded before stopping? Even knowing that it was supposed to be resume I wasn’t sure that’s what it would do.
What do other recording apps do?  Maybe a blue or black circle? Or maybe the scale of the button is the challenge?
